product_description: A kitten heel brings poised height to a sophisticated pointy-toe pump fitted with a podiastrist-designed Orthaheel footbed.
product_details_and_care:
A kitten heel brings poised height to a sophisticated pointy-toe pump fitted with a podiastrist-designed Orthaheel footbed.
2" heel (size 8.5)
Cushioned footbed with arch support
Leather and textile upper/synthetic, lining and textile lining/synthetic sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
Item #6003329
product_size_info:
True to size.
M(medium)=B, W(wide)=D.
We recommend wearing new Vionic footwear for limited hours in the first few days of use to allow feet to adjust to a new level of orthotic comfort and support.
